questions.question: Water
questions.answer: Water related dreams can mean you feel overwhelmed or unsupported by your loved ones. A dream about water can mean various things but mainly it symbolises being either trapped or free. The meaning depends on what you link with water in your day to day life. If itâ€™s a large amount of water it can mean that you have deep emotions or a strong emotional reaction to something happening in your life right now.

questions.question: Vehicles
questions.answer: To dream about a vehicle tends to mean nothing in particular, HOWEVER if you dream about something like a car crash or accident, it means you have low confidence. This type of dream should be paid more attention to as it symbolises emotional stress or a bad mental state. If you dream about a car crash it can actually meant hat youâ€™re worried about losing something like a job, relationship or even your house, so you need to find the source of that worry. Work out why you're worried about that thing, and then fix it.

questions.question: Being trapped
questions.answer: To dream about being trapped tends to mean youâ€™re just worried about your current situation. This can mean your job, relationship or even which country youâ€™re in. Your mind tends to show you things in a subtle way, so if youâ€™re worried about your job holding you back from traveling for example, your brain might create a dream in which you're trapped. A dream about being trapped in a small space usually means you're just not happy with where you are and you want to change your current situation. Thereâ€™s not many cases where dreaming about being trapped is a good thing, so be careful with this one!

questions.question: Teeth falling out
questions.answer: The teeth falling out dream (or I should say nightmare!) is a VERY common dream that people have. Almost everyoneâ€™s had a dream about their teeth falling out at one point in their lives, and probably wondered what it means. Turns out this dream is very common because when weâ€™re young and we lose our teeth for the first time (our milk teeth to make way for the real ones), we're scared. I remember being terrified of what was happening to me when my teeth started falling out, and itâ€™s usually the first REALLY traumatic or scary thing we experience as young people.

questions.question: Babies
questions.answer: To dream about babies just means you want to continue and grow your family and create a legacy. IT means you want to be a father or mother figure in your childrens lives and make the world a better place. The other side of this dream however, could be that youâ€™re holding something back. Dreaming about children can also mean that youâ€™re wanting to develop your relationship with your own inner child. Itâ€™s said that everyone has an inner child or true self that is itching to be released and freed. This sometimes manifests in the form of dreams.

questions.question: Animals
questions.answer: A dream about animals is almost always about an aspect of yourself. Animals are so easy to link to a personality trait or emotion, for example you might link a snake to someone whoâ€™s deceptive or dishonest. You might link a lion to someone whoâ€™s strong, courageous and powerful. So to dream about a specific animal is usually fairly easy to analyse. Sometimes the actual animals we dream about can just mean weâ€™re thinking about our own behaviour in the waking world.

questions.question: Being chased
questions.answer: Usually its not anything in particular but just the â€˜feelingâ€™ like youâ€™re being chased, and so you run and run. In the dream of course, running and â€˜pushingâ€™ your leg muscles to run faster does nothing but slow you down, just like trying to fly. Now, this is an interesting one because it could just be that youâ€™ve seen too many horror films and youâ€™re scared of someone chasing you. Chase scenes are VERY common in horror films, and you might just be reliving it because you just saw a film. It can also however, mean that youâ€™re worried about an issue that youâ€™ve no resolved. Letâ€™s say if youâ€™re leaving that work you KNOW you need to do for next week, to dream about being chased is like your brain saying â€˜come on, pay attention to this issue nowâ€™.

questions.question: Death or dying
questions.answer: A dream about death can actually just mean youâ€™re accepting that youâ€™re changing into someone else. When we change, itâ€™s said that we die a â€˜small deathâ€™, meaning a part of who we WERE dies and makes way for the person weâ€™re becoming.

questions.question: Religious symbols
questions.answer: Usually you only dream about a cross if youâ€™re very much in the world that recognises them. The cross is traditionally a Christian symbol meaning the death and rebirth of Christ. This means for the most part, only religious people will dream about crosses, because they see them every day as they look through their church, bible etc. In other parts of the world however, this can mean different things so itâ€™s worth doing a bit of research to find out what this means for you. If youâ€™re not a Christian and you keep dreaming about crosses, it could mean something different. For some parts of the world, it can mean trouble or dangerous times ahead.

questions.question: Taking exams
questions.answer: This type of dream can just mean that you're being put to the test in waking life, or you feel like youâ€™re being judged by the people around you. It doesnâ€™t have be be a bad thing, and sometimes itâ€™s just your brain saying â€˜youâ€™re being watched by peopleâ€™. It can also literally mean that youâ€™re worried about taking your exams though, if youâ€™re still in school! But for adults who have long since passed their exams, it usually just means that youâ€™re worried about what others will think of you, or how youâ€™ll perform in some big event thatâ€™s coming up.

questions.question: I had a dream with babies, what does it mean?
questions.answer: To dream about babies just means you want to continue and grow your family and create a legacy. IT means you want to be a father or mother figure in your childrens lives and make the world a better place. The other side of this dream however, could be that you’re holding something back. Dreaming about children can also mean that you’re wanting to develop your relationship with your own inner child. It’s said that everyone has an inner child or true self that is itching to be released and freed. This sometimes manifests in the form of dreams.
